items.title: Steak
items.recipe: Sear in a cast iron, and baste with butter!
steps: Season your steak with salt and pepper
Lightly oil a cast iron pan and heat on medium high heat
When the pan is hot enough, just barely starting to smoke, add your steaks!
Sear each side for two minutes, add butter and thyme to the pan
Cook for 4-5 minutes for rare, 6-8 minutes for medium rare, and don't ever cook a good steak past medium :)

items.title: Chicken
items.recipe: Season generously, and bake in the oven!
steps: Season your chicken with thyme, rosemary, salt and pepper
Cover a baking sheet in tin foil, and lightly spray with cooking oil or spread olive oil
When the oven reaches temperature, place chickens on baking sheet and place in top rack
Let rest for about 5 minutes and enjoy!

items.title: Lambchop
items.recipe: Cover in butter, garlic, and thyme, and bake!
steps: In a small bowl, slightly melt butter in the microwave, about 10 seconds
Mix minced garlic and thyme into the butter
Spread this butter mixture all over the lamb chop
Place on a baking rack and cook for 25 minutes
Let rest for about 5 minutes, slice, and enjoy!
